Thorn.desc: When hit, return 50% of the damage taken to the attacker

Fragile_Mind_LowMorale.name: Perilous Heart
Fragile_Mind_LowMorale.desc: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 3 Bind

ErodingMind.name: Corroding Heart
ErodingMind.desc: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Down, 2 Fragile, and 5 Bind

CrimsonResultUp.name: Wrath Power Up
CrimsonResultUp.desc: Wrath skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

EmittedCurrent.name: Spark Discharge
EmittedCurrent.desc: When hit, the attacker gains +1 Charge Count; when hit with a Gloom attack, gain +1 Rupture Count, then reduce Count by 1

DistortedDongrangRadiantVanity.name: Radiant Vanity
DistortedDongrangRadiantVanity.desc: At the start of the turn, Dongrang gains 1 Protection and 1 Attack Power Up.

DistortedDongrangEmptyMark.name: Empty Mark
DistortedDongrangEmptyMark.desc: Targeted by Dongrang. Gain 2 Bind every turn, and take +50% damage from Dongrang.

DistortedDongrangEarnestAchievement.name: Earnest Accomplishment
DistortedDongrangEarnestAchievement.desc: If this unit is defeated or its HP is brought to 1, the attacker gains buffs.

DistortedDongrangEmptyHonor.name: Empty Honor
DistortedDongrangEmptyHonor.desc: If Dongrang defeats this unit, he loses HP, gains 1 Emptiness, and is weakened next turn.

DistortedDongrangMomentaryGlory.name: Momentary Glory
DistortedDongrangMomentaryGlory.desc: At 3+ Count, Dongrang becomes more powerful.

DistortedDongrangFruition.name: Borne Fruition
DistortedDongrangFruition.desc: The unit that defeated this unit heals HP, and gains 1 Haste and 1 Attack Power Up next turn

EgoAwakenDongrangRadiantDesire.name: Radiant Desire
EgoAwakenDongrangRadiantDesire.desc: Turn Start: Dongrang gains 1 Damage Up and 1 Protection.

EgoAwakenDongrangSeed.name: Seeds
EgoAwakenDongrangSeed.desc: Turn End: At 5+ Count, gain Nutrient Drain for 2 turns; at less than 5 Count, reduce Count by 1

EgoAwakenDongrangOverHeal.name: Overheal
EgoAwakenDongrangOverHeal.desc: Count rises by the amount of HP Dongrang caused to heal; at 50+ Count, take Gluttony damage by the effect's Count, gain 5 Fragile, and remove the effect.

SinkingSurge.name: Sinking Deluge
SinkingSurge.desc:
Deal SP damage by (Sinking Count * Sinking Potency), then remove Sinking
If target's SP is -45 or lower, the excess SP damage is dealt as Gloom-affinity HP damage
(Units with no Sanity take all of it as Gloom HP damage)

AmberResultUp.name: Sloth Power Up
AmberResultUp.desc: Sloth skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

Blue.name: Tears
Blue.desc:
Turn End: Lose 5 SP
Tails Coins inflict 2 Sinking

DongbaekFullBloomDisplay.name: Fully Bloomed
DongbaekFullBloomDisplay.desc:
Cannot act
At the end of the turn, lose 20 SP; if SP reaches -45, fully heal SP, then gain 'Dazzled Mind' next turn.
If this effect isn't removed for 2 turns, remove it at the end of the turn.

TakeHpHealIncrease.name: HP Healing Boost
TakeHpHealIncrease.desc: HP healed by Passives, Skill effects, or Coin effects increases proportionally to the value of this effect. (Max 5)

SkillPowerUp.name: Base Power Up
SkillPowerUp.desc: Raise the Base Power of Skills by the effect's Count.

MaxHpMultiplier.name: Max HP Up
MaxHpMultiplier.desc: Raise the Max HP by 10% per Count.

KCorpSerum.name: K Corp Ampule
KCorpSerum.desc:
Turn Start: At less than 4 Count, heal by (Count * 5)% of Max HP
At 4+ Count, the unit dies

Talisman.name: Talisman
Talisman.desc:
On hit, inflict Rupture by the Count; When hit, gain Rupture by the Count.
Turn End: At 6+ Count, remove all Talisman and take fixed damage by its Count.

Choice_90104001.name: Understanding
Choice_90104001.desc: At the start of the battle, gain 2 E.G.O resources for every Affinity.

Choice_9010400101.name: Determined
Choice_9010400101.desc: All Ally Units gain +2 Skill Final Power for this battle

Choice_90104002.name: Longing
Choice_90104002.desc: All Ally Units gain +1 Skill Power for this battle

MentalSystemResultIncrease_Typo.name: SP Heal Efficiency
MentalSystemResultIncrease_Typo.desc: Amount of SP healed due to the Identity's 'Base factors increasing Sanity(SP)'

MentalSystemResultDecrease_Typo.name: SP Loss Efficiency
MentalSystemResultDecrease_Typo.desc: Amount of SP lost due to the Identity's 'Base factors decreasing Sanity(SP)'

DuelDeclaration.name: Declared Duel
DuelDeclaration.desc: In a clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power, and gains 1 Haste next turn after a successful attack. (4 times per turn) Expires if the declarer inflicts this status on another target. Replaced when another unit declares a duel.

Aggro.name: Aggro
Aggro.desc: In focused encounters, slots with higher Aggro values are more likely to be targeted by enemies.

BurstVulnerable.name: Rupture Fragility
BurstVulnerable.desc: Take +1 damage per Count from Rupture effects for one turn.

EmergencyFeed.name: Emergency Nutrient Supply
EmergencyFeed.desc: At the end of the turn, if this unit has healed 15% of Max HP or more, the body is restored next turn.

Bullet_Crab.name: Molted Shell Shot
Bullet_Crab.desc: Resource used by certain skills for additional effects.

SinkingVulnerable.name: Sinking Fragility
SinkingVulnerable.desc: Take +1 damage per Count from Sinking effects for one turn.

BurstProtection.name: Rupture Protection
BurstProtection.desc: Take -1 damage per Count from Rupture effects for one turn.

PseudoLastBoss_KingCrap.name: Crab Rage
PseudoLastBoss_KingCrap.desc:
At the start of the turn, apply Attack Power Up to all other allied crabs, and gain 2 Protection if its Shell isn't broken.
-5 SP to target when using a skill.
At 50%- HP, every part gains 2 Attack Power Up and 2 Fragile.

ChargeForceField.name: Charge Barrier
ChargeForceField.desc:
- Gain (Charge Barrier # x 3) Shield.
- Lose 1 Charge Barrier after losing (Charge Barrier # x 3) Shield.
- (If the unit is a W Corp. employee, ALL Charge Barrier effects activate at (Charge Barrier # x 5) instead of at (Charge Barrier # x 3))
- Turn End: Gain a Charge Count for each Charge Barrier #, and Charge Barrier and Shield gained from Charge Barrier expire completely next turn

SlashResultUp.name: Slash Power Up
SlashResultUp.desc: Slash skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

Discard.name: Discard
Discard.desc:
- Delete Skills that fit the condition and are selectable during the Chaining Phase from the Dashboard. (Defensive & E.G.O Skills do not count. Does not delete the Skill from the upcoming Skills list)
- Discarded Skills will not activate Skill effects or Coin effects other than effects from Discard, and will not give E.G.O resources.

KnowledgeExplored.name: Insight
KnowledgeExplored.desc: The rank of the last Skill Discarded by the unit with this effect (Base Value: 1)

Unjust_Enrichment.name: Unjust Enrichment
Unjust_Enrichment.desc:
- Gained on Heads Hit against target with Bleed (Max 4)
- When 'Bullets are Pricey' Passive activates, consume all Unjust Enrichment stack to deal bonus damage

Resentment.name: Resentment
Resentment.desc:
If the enemy with the <sprite name="RetaliationBook"><color=#e30000><link="RetaliationBook">Vengeance Mark</color></link></u> is hit by an attack, this effect expires at Attack End.
Expires at the end of the turn

RetaliationBook.name: Vengeance Mark
RetaliationBook.desc: Applied to the unit that dealt the most damage to an ally (Max 1)

PenetrateResultUp.name: Pierce Power Up
PenetrateResultUp.desc: Pierce skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

DuelDeclaration_DonQuixote.name: Declared Duel - Don Quixote
DuelDeclaration_DonQuixote.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when other unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

DuelDeclaration_Outis.name: Declared Duel - Outis
DuelDeclaration_Outis.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when other unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

DuelDeclaration_Sinclair.name: Declared Duel - Sinclair
DuelDeclaration_Sinclair.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when other unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

VibrationExplosion.name: Tremor Burst
VibrationExplosion.desc: Raise target's Stagger Threshold by Tremor Potency on target

OneOnOneDuel.name: Single Combat
OneOnOneDuel.desc: Established when the attacked Slot is targeted by a single unit, and only by that single unit. This condition is established only between the attacking unit and the attacked Slot. (Does not apply to reused Skills)

FreischutzShotCount.name: Magic Bullet
FreischutzShotCount.desc:
- Max: 7
- Value changes depending on certain Skill effects.
- The higher the value, the higher the Base Power and Coin Power of Skill 3

DarkFlame.name: Dark Flame
DarkFlame.desc:
- Unique Burn
- Max Value: 7
- Target loses Defense Level equal to the value of this effect
- Turn End: Deal (Value x Burn on target) Pride Affinity damage, then expires

CtrlTeamCaptain.name: Control Team Captain
CtrlTeamCaptain.desc:
- Skill Slot +1
- Modify Skill pool: Gain 1 use of Skill 3, but lose 1 use of Skill 1
- When this unit defeats an enemy with a Skill, 2 allies(including this unit) with the least SP heal 25 SP. Gain +2 E.G.O resource to the Affinity of the Skill that defeated the enemy; gain +1 E.G.O resource to rest of the Affinities

HeatedGasHarpoon.name: Heated Gas Harpoon
HeatedGasHarpoon.desc: For 1 turn, inflict 1 Burn with Heads Hit

OverHeatedGasHarpoon.name: Overheated Gas Harpoon
OverHeatedGasHarpoon.desc: For 1 turn, inflict 1 Burn On Hit

CoverAttack.name: Assist Attack
CoverAttack.desc:
- If unit A applies this effect to unit B: Unit B follows up with an Unopposed Attack with its Skill 1 against the same enemy Unit A attacked with its Skill. Activates at Unit A's Attack End.
- The Skill used as an Assist Attack does not affect Unit B's upcoming Skills list.

ReCompulsion.name: Reverse Compulsion
ReCompulsion.desc: Heal 15 SP at every Turn Start

IndigoResultUp.name: Pride Power Up
IndigoResultUp.desc: Pride Skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

BladeResultUpTier1.name: Sword of the Homeland - Rending
BladeResultUpTier1.desc: Skill 1 gains Final Power by the effect’s Count for this turn.

BladeResultUpTier2.name: Sword of the Homeland - Penetrating
BladeResultUpTier2.desc: Skill 2 gains Final Power by the effect’s Count for this turn.

SwordPlayOfTheHomeland.name: Swordplay of the Homeland
SwordPlayOfTheHomeland.desc:
- When at 5+ Poise, upon Skill use, Skill 1 and Skill 2 gain Coin Power +(3/# of Coins, minimum 1) and deal +(30/# of Coins)% damage on Critical Hit
- When at 7+ Poise, upon Skill use, Skill 3 deals +(30/# of Coins)% more damage and deals +(50/# of Coins)% damage on Critical Hit

SwordPlayOfTheMemorial.name: Remembrance
SwordPlayOfTheMemorial.desc:
- When at 5+ Poise, upon Skill use, Skill 1 and Skill 2 gain Coin Power +(3/# of Coins, minimum 1) and deal +(30/# of Coins)% damage on Critical Hit
- When at 7+ Poise, upon Skill use, Skill 3 deals +(30/# of Coins)% more damage and deals +(50/# of Coins)% damage on Critical Hit

RedApricotBlossom.name: Red Plum Blossom
RedApricotBlossom.desc:
- Unique Bleed
- Max value: 10
- +10% chance for this unit to be Critically Hit if this unit is the main target
- When struck by a Critical Hit, gain Bleed equal to the half of the value and take +(value x 3)% damage on Critical Hit
- Reduce value by 1 when hit

VibrationCollapse.name: Tremor - Decay
VibrationCollapse.desc:
Lose 1 Defense Level for every 4 Tremor Potency on self
When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raises or reduces Tremor Potency/Count)

EchoOfMansion.name: Echoes of the Manor
EchoOfMansion.desc:
- 50% chance to gain +1 Sinking Count when gaining Sinking Potency or Count from Skill or Coin effects
- Units with SP: Change Panic Type to Echoes of the Manor. When this unit Panics, inflict 2 Echoes of the Manor to 2 random other allies of this unit
- Units without SP: -10% chance to flip Heads
- Reduce by 1 at Turn End
This effect is not cumulative; inflicting it will replace the current value with the inflicted value.
※ Apply the "Units without SP" conditional to certain enemies that have SP but can't change their Panic Types.

Switch_Vibration.name: Amplitude Conversion
Switch_Vibration.desc:
Converts Tremor or already converted Tremor on target to a different type of Tremor.
Potency and Count values do not change over the conversion.

AzureResultUp.name: Gloom Power Up
AzureResultUp.desc: Gloom Skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

VibrationCrack.name: Tremor - Fracture
VibrationCrack.desc:
- When Staggered, and when the sum of Tremor Potency and Count adds up to 20 or higher, raise Stagger Level by 1
- Cannot exceed maximum Stagger Level with this effect

When hit by attacks that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raises or reduces Tremor Potency/Count)

ForwardToTheKing.name: Before the King
ForwardToTheKing.desc: When this unit's attack with 1 Atk Weight hits, inflict 50% of the resulting Coin value On Hit as (Affinity/Attack Type of the Attack Skill used to hit) damage against 2 other attackable enemies with the least HP.

ForwardToTheBoundKing.name: Before the King in Binds
ForwardToTheBoundKing.desc: When this unit's attack with 1 Atk Weight hits, inflict 100% of the resulting Coin value On Hit as (Affinity/Attack Type of the Attack Skill used to hit) damage against 2 other attackable enemies with the least HP

MarkOfButler.name: B.M.
MarkOfButler.desc:
Enhances Edgar Family Chief Butler Ryōshū Skills against targets with this effect.
Turn End: reduce the Count by 1

PreparedMeat.name: Prepared Meat
PreparedMeat.desc: If conditions are met, Fairy Queen kills this unit at Turn End

Hunger.name: Hunger
Hunger.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 if this unit failed to defeat an ally with Prepared Meat.
At 75%- HP, gain 2. At 50%- HP, gain 3.
Turn Start: lose 1 if this unit defeated an ally with Prepared Meat.
At 0 value, gain (# of allies defeated x 3)Attack Power Down and Defense Power Down.

UnstableFeeling.name: Volatile Passion
UnstableFeeling.desc:
- On Hit, inflict 1 Burn
- If the main target has Burn, Final Power +1
- When hit, if this unit had a Defense Skill chained at Combat Start, inflict Burn against the attacker for the turn
- Turn End: lose (# of turns spent in Volatile E.G.O state x 5) SP. (Max SP loss : 40)

VibrationEcho.name: Tremor - Reverb
VibrationEcho.desc:
- On Tremor Burst, take Sloth damage equal to Tremor Potency on self.
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1.
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

ShieldManagerCryingToad.name: Blubberbubble
ShieldManagerCryingToad.desc:
- This effect counts as a 'Shield Management' effect.
- Turn End: Reduce Count by 1
- This unit does not lose Shield at Turn End as long as it has the Blubberbubble effect (unless depleted by damage or effect)
- If the Shield affected by Blubberbubble breaks due to taking damage, inflict 4 Sinking Potency/Count against the attacker. (How much of that '4' value is Potency or Count is randomly determined)
- This unit can stack their Shield value by using this effect. However, as long as Blubberbubble is in effect, the Shield value cannot exceed 60% of this unit's Max HP.

VibrationContinue.name: Tremor - Everlasting
VibrationContinue.desc:
- When hit by Skills or Coin effects that trigger Tremor Burst, (Tremor Potency on self)% chance to trigger an additional Tremor Burst. (max 50%)
- When hit by Skills or Coin effects that trigger Tremor Burst, (Tremor Count on self)% chance to trigger an additional Tremor Burst. (max 50%)
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

TimeSuspend.name: Time Moratorium
TimeSuspend.desc:
- Does not take any damage as long as this effect is active; store all damage received instead
- Combat End: If there is only 1 Count left of this effect, the effect triggers Tremor Burst after dealing (100 + (Stack x 15)% of stored damage as Sloth damage
- Turn End: gain 1 Stack and lose 1 Count
- The Time Moratorium will immediately expire after triggering the Tremor Burst and the Sloth damage effect if another instance of Time Moratorium is inflicted on a unit with Time Moratorium.

TimeRentalTwoPersonality.name: Borrowed Time
TimeRentalTwoPersonality.desc:
Turn End at 2+ Count:
- Gain (Borrowed Time Count - 1) Haste, Clash Power Up, and Fragile next turn
- If this unit is set to gain more Bind than Haste next turn, the Borrowed Time effect expires at the next Turn Start, and this unit gets Staggered

Turn End: At 1 Count, gain 2(Borrowed Time Stack - 1) Bind next turn
Turn End: Gain 1 Stack, lose 1 Count

VibrationChainPersonality.name: Tremor - Chain
VibrationChainPersonality.desc:
- Lose 1 Clash Power for every 10 Tremor Potency on self (max 3)
- When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
- (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

GazePersonality.name: Gaze of Contempt
GazePersonality.desc:
- Max Value: 7
- Deal +7% more damage for every Gaze of Contempt
- Turn End: this effect expires
- Turn End: At 7 Gaze of Contempt value, convert it to Contempt of the Gaze next turn instead of expiring

[Contempt of the Gaze]
- Gain 7 Protection
- Gain 7 Damage Down
- One of this unit's Slots gains +20 Aggro
- Cannot gain Gaze of Contempt as long as Contempt of the Gaze is active
- Turn End: this effect expires

ContemptPersonality.name: Contempt of the Gaze
ContemptPersonality.desc:
- Gain 7 Protection
- Gain 7 Damage Down
- One of this unit's Skill Slots gains +20 Aggro
- Cannot gain Gaze of Contempt as long as Contempt of the Gaze is active
- Turn End: this effect expires

KnowledgeTraining.name: Erudition
KnowledgeTraining.desc:
- Max Value: 6
- When Discarding a Skill, gain (Erudition x 1.5)% of this unit's max HP as Shield (once per turn)
- If this unit Discards a Skill at 2+ Insight, gain 1 Clash Power (once per turn)
- Reduced by 1 when taking HP damage after getting hit by an enemy's Attack Skill
- Expires when Staggered

BoseProjektil.name: Torn Memory
BoseProjektil.desc:
- Max Value : 7
- Used for certain Skills

ChargeLoad.name: Load
ChargeLoad.desc:
- Max Value : 6
- Attack Skills that consumed Charge Count deal +2.5% more damage for every value on self (max 15%)
- If the affected unit is a W Corp. employee., deal +5% more damage for every value instead (max 30%)
- Turn End: this effect expires

PhotoElectricity.name: Photoelectricity
PhotoElectricity.desc:
Max Value: 3
When this unit is hit, the Attacker gains Charge Count equal to the value (once per Skill)
- If the Attacker has 5- Charge Count, they gain +3 additional Charge Count
Turn End: this effect expires

Coffin.name: Coffin
Coffin.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- At Turn End:
  - Gain 2 Damage Up next turn for every 3 Value (max 6)
  - Raise minimum Speed by 1 next turn for every 4 Value (max 2)
  - Gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn for every 5 Value (max 2)

WildHunt.name: Wild Hunt
WildHunt.desc:
- In the same turn this unit gained Wild Hunt for the first time, always have 1 remaining HP; "revive"(heal 50% HP and reset SP to 0) this unit at Turn End.
- If this unit is killed by an attack, gain E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource
- If this unit is killed by an attack, inflict 3 Sinking against the last attacker
- Dies at the end of the same turn this unit was revived in

NightPathfinding.name: Dullahan
NightPathfinding.desc:
- Max Value: 3
- Gain 3 Offense Level
- Lose 3 Defense Level
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- Turn End: Gain 1 Dullahan next turn (At -25 SP or less, however, completely lose Dullahan)
- Turn End: If this unit has Dullahan, lose (15 - (Coffin/2)) SP. (min 10)

WanderingFootsteps.name: Impending Ruin
WanderingFootsteps.desc:
- Units with SP: change their Panic Type to ""Ruin"".
(Ruin: When this unit enters Low Morale state, gain 3 Sinking at every Turn End and lose 1 Clash Power. When this unit Panics, gain 5 Sinking and 3 Sinking Count at every Turn End and lose 2 Clash Power)
- Units without SP: -10% chance to flip Heads
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End
- This effect is not cumulative; inflicting it will replace the current value with the inflicted value.
※ Apply the ""Units without SP"" conditional to certain enemies that have SP but can't change their Panic Types.

WanderingFootsteps_Main.name: Impending Ruin
WanderingFootsteps_Main.desc:
- Targets with SP: Change their Panic Type to 'Ruin'
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End

WanderingFootsteps_Sub.name: Impending Ruin
WanderingFootsteps_Sub.desc:
-10% chance to flip Heads
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End

WanderingFootsteps_LowMorale.name: Ruin
WanderingFootsteps_LowMorale.desc:
- Low Morale
- Clash Power -1 on self. Gain 3 Sinking at every Turn End

WanderingFootsteps_Panic.name: Ruin
WanderingFootsteps_Panic.desc:
- Panic
- Clash Power -2 on self. Gain 5 Sinking and +3 Sinking Count at every Turn End

UninvitedGuestPersonality.name: The Uninvited
UninvitedGuestPersonality.desc:
- Max Value: 2
- Upon death, the last attacker heals 3 SP; then, a random ally without this effect gains 2 Stacks of this effect.
- Take +0.5% more damage for every Sinking on self (max 10%; for Focused Encounters, count Sinking on each Part separately)
- Turn End: reduced by 1

DevyatDimensionalSack.name: Courier Trunk
DevyatDimensionalSack.desc:
- Base Value: 0
- Turn Start: gain 3 Stack
- Stack does not expire upon Retreat; it is stored instead
- At 10+ Stack: raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- At 20+ Stack: Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Slash Damage Up
- At 30+ Stack:
· On Skill Use, take (Stack/3)% HP damage and (Stack/3) SP damage
· On Turn End, take (Stack/2)% HP damage and (Stack/2) SP damage (applies before Retreat)

Retreat.name: Strategic R&R Mode
Retreat.desc:
- Turn End: recover from Stagger and Retreat from the Encounter (unless it's a forced Stagger; does not count as death)
· In Chain Battles, give this unit's Slots to a Substituted unit and move to the rearmost place in the Backup units' Deployment order (escape from the Encounter entirely if there are no other Backup Units remaining to swap places with next turn. When returning to battle, return in the order they retreated in)
· When returning to battle, return with the same amount of HP and SP this unit had when it retreated, and eliminate all effects on self for a select few (if this unit had less than 0 SP when retreating, reset SP to 0 instead)

DefensiveStance.name: Defensive Stance
DefensiveStance.desc:
- Max Value: 2
- This effect does not compound in potency; stacking it only extends its duration.
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End
- When a unit gains this effect, gain the following effects:
  · Fix this unit's Speed to its minimum value
  · Gain 5 Defense Level Up
  · Each of this unit's Slots gain +(10 / this unit's # of Slots) Aggro
  · When chaining Skills, this unit can draw enemies' attack toward this unit regardless of Speed (Focused Encounters only)
  · Upon Clash Win, trigger Tremor Burst
  · Cannot be Staggered by damage

CanDuelGuard.name: Clashable Guard
CanDuelGuard.desc:
- On Clash Win: raise the target's Stagger Threshold by this unit's final Clash Power.
- On Clash Lose: when hit, reduce the attacker's final Skill Power by this unit's Final Power.

SuperCoin.name: Unbreakable Coin
SuperCoin.desc:
- This coin does not break upon Clash Lose.
- If an Attack Skill has this Coin, attack with this Coin after getting hit.
- Upon Clash Lose, fix the Coin Power of the unbroken Coin to 1

TipsinessRail.name: Tipsy
TipsinessRail.desc: Lose Clash Power by the effect's Count (Max 5)

FairyCharm.name: Charmed
FairyCharm.desc:
- All damage dealt to Fairy reduced to 0.
- Expires when Fairy dies.

DecoyRegenerated.name: Regenerate
DecoyRegenerated.desc: Gain 1 every time a part is restored

WaveFoxUmbrella.name: Protection Umbrella
WaveFoxUmbrella.desc:
All parts gain Protection equal to the value
When using Waiting Skill, Summon Old Umbrella equal to the value
1 Spent every time an Umbrella is broken.

InterlockingTime_Re.name: Interlocking Time
InterlockingTime_Re.desc: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 2 times the accumulated damage, and gain 3 Bind next turn.

TimeRental_Re.name: Borrowed Time
TimeRental_Re.desc: At the end of the turn, gain 3 Haste, 2 Damage Up, and 2 Offense Level Up; If only 1 Count remains, gain 3 Bind 1 Attack Power Down, and 2 Fragile next turn

ReattachedCurseTag_Re.name: Reattached Curse Talisman
ReattachedCurseTag_Re.desc:
At 9+, gain 5 Bind at the start of the turn.
At 12+, gain 5 Attack Power Down at the start of the turn. (Max 12)

WrappedCurseTagRe.name: Entangled Curse Talisman
WrappedCurseTagRe.desc:
Deal +1% damage per Count
At 9+ Count, gain 2 Attack Power Down at turn start (Max 9)

AccumulatedPast.name: Accumulated Past
AccumulatedPast.desc:
Gain 11 at the end of the Turn.
Spent completely when the Body Part is broken.

PrepareSinRose.name: Crown of Thorns
PrepareSinRose.desc: Generates a Rose unit whose Affinity corresponds to the most-owned Skill Affinity of the target inflicted with this effect

BloomingRose.name: Blooming Sin
BloomingRose.desc:
At the end of the turn
- Gain 1 Count.
- Bound Identity loses HP equal to 25% of Max HP.
- Lose 10% of E.G.O resource corresponding to the Rose's.

PenanceThird.desc:
- Heal 6 SP On Hit with Base Skill Coins that gain Penitence
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

Emptiness.name: Only Ashes Remain
Emptiness.desc:
- Cannot maintain Red Eyes & Penitence
- When gaining Red Eyes with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by (Red Eyes gained)% of this unit's max HP (2 times per turn)
- When gaining Penitence with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ((Penitence gained)/2) SP (2 times per turn)
- Turn End: this effect expires

SinkingWhite.name: Butterfly
SinkingWhite.desc:
- Unique Sinking
- Base Value: 0, Max Value: 15
- The Potency and the Count of this effect are called "The Living" and "The Departed", respectively.
- When hit, the attacker heals (The Living/4) SP. (min 1; rounded down)
- When hit, and if this unit's SP is at less than 0, take (Sinking Potency/5) Gloom damage for every value of The Departed. (max Gloom damage 30; rounded down; deals half damage to targets without SP.)
- Turn End: Reset The Departed of this effect to 0; then, gain Sinking equal to The Living and convert The Living into The Departed.
- No external effects can raise the amount of Butterfly inflicted. "Inflict additional Sinking" effects inflict additional Sinking instead of additional Butterfly.
- This effect expires when both The Living and The Departed reach 0.

BulletLament.name: The Living & The Departed
BulletLament.desc:
- Unique Ammo
- The sum of Potency and Count maxes out at 20.
- Consumed for certain Skills.
- Whether The Living(Potency) or The Departed(Count) will be consumed for each shot is randomly determined
- Some attacks cancel if this unit runs out of ammo.

TrainTeamCaptain.name: Training Team Captain
TrainTeamCaptain.desc:
Skill Slot +1
Modify Skill pool: Gain 1 use of Skill 3, but lose 1 use of Skill 1
Turn Start: heal 15 SP
Increase the amount of Burn, Bleed, Rupture, Sinking, or Tremor inflicted by +1 (including 'Unique Status Effects')
Increase the amount of Poise or Charge(including 'Unique Charge') gained by +1
On Kill, Gain +2 E.G.O resource to the Affinity of the Skill that defeated the enemy; gain +1 E.G.O resource to rest of the Affinities

VioletUnderstand.name: Understanding
VioletUnderstand.desc:
- Deal +5% more damage per Stack
- Take +5% more damage per Stack
(max value : 5)

MentalCrack.name: Mental Fracture
MentalCrack.desc:
SP Loss Efficiency +1 per Stack (max 5)
Expires when it reaches 5 Stack, and take 10 SP damage
Lose 1 Stack per turn

ImpendingCollapse.name: Imminent Decay
ImpendingCollapse.desc:
Turn End: Lose 1 Stack
Turn Start: At 1- Stack, use a special Skill

ReloadLament.name: Reload
ReloadLament.desc:
- Effect applied to The Living & The Departed(Unique Ammo)
- Consume (30 - (The Living + The Departed))/2 SP. (rounded down)
- Reset both The Living and The Departed values on self to 0, and gain the max value of their sum based on the probabilities listed in the Passive 'ISeeTheDyingButterfly.'
- On Reload, gain at least 1 of The Living and The Departed.
